---
title: "Swen Kuh Approved for Doctor of Philosophy in Statistics"
date: "05-05-2022"
categories: [news, phd student]
---

Ms. Swen Kuh (now Dr. Kuh) was notified that she has been approved for the award of the degree of Doctor of Philosophy in Statistics from the Research School of Finance, Actuarial Studies and Statistics at the Australian National University. She is currently a post-doctoral fellow at Monash University.
